page.title: 12OUR DIET
page.content: We eat a mixture of vegetables, meat, fruit, dairy and cereal products. We eat different parts of {vegetables} We sometimes eat the leaves, roots or flowers and seeds. The most popular vegetable is {potatoes} because you can have them in all sorts of ways. We like carrots because they are good for us. Some {meat} which we eat are pork which comes from pigs, beef which comes from cattle and lamb which comes from sheep. Most of our {dairy products} come from cows. We consume milk, cream, cheese and butter. {Cereal Products} include Cornflakes, Weetabix, porridge and muesli. Cereal products are made from grains like corn, barley and wheat. Written by Louise Rowell and Michelle Moules
